description:
As a land owner
  I want to register my land title
  So that I can have a verified and blockchain-recorded property ownership

elements.name: Successful land title registration with payment

steps.name: I have valid land title information
I submit the land title registration
the land title should be created with status "PENDING"
a transaction ID should be generated
documents should be uploaded to document service
the land title status should change to "ACTIVE"
the land title should be recorded on blockchain
a blockchain hash should be stored
I have valid land title information
I have not uploaded any documents
I submit the land title registration
the land title registration should fail
I should see error message "No attachments provided"
a land title already exists with title number "TCT-2024-003"
I try to register a land title with the same title number "TCT-2024-003"
the land title registration should fail
I should see error message "Land title already exists"
I have a land title with status "PENDING"
I have a land title with status "PENDING"
the land title status should change to "ACTIVE"
the blockchain service should be called
the blockchain hash should be stored in database
a success event should be sent to payment service
I have a land title with status "PENDING"
the land title status should change to "ACTIVE" temporarily
the land title status should rollback to "PENDING"
a rollback event should be sent to payment service
the payment should be marked as "FAILED"

elements.name: Retrieve land title by title number

steps.name: a land title exists with title number "TCT-2024-007"
I should see the land title details
the blockchain hash should be displayed if available
multiple land titles exist in the system
I should see a list of 3 land titles
the list should be ordered by creation date
I have a land title with status "ACTIVE"
the land title has a blockchain hash
the land title status should change to "PENDING"
a cancellation hash should be recorded on blockchain
the land title status should change back to "ACTIVE"
a reactivation hash should be recorded on blockchain
all three hashes should be stored (original, cancellation, reactivation)

name: Land Title Registration

description:
As a land registry officer
  I want to manage land title transfers
  So that ownership can be transferred between parties

elements.name: Create land transfer with ACTIVE land title

steps.name: a land title exists with status "ACTIVE"
I create a land transfer with buyer details
the land transfer should be created with status "PENDING"

elements.name: Cannot create land transfer with PENDING land title

steps.name: a land title exists with status "PENDING"
I try to create a land transfer
I should see error message "Cannot transfer land title with PENDING status"
the land transfer should not be created

elements.name: Cancel land transfer with PENDING status

steps.name: a land title exists with status "ACTIVE"
a land transfer exists with status "PENDING"
the land transfer status should change to "CANCELLED"

elements.name: Cannot cancel land transfer with COMPLETED status

steps.name: a land transfer exists with status "COMPLETED"
I try to cancel the land transfer
I should see error message "Cannot cancel completed land transfer"

elements.name: Update land transfer with PENDING status

steps.name: a land transfer exists with status "PENDING"
I update the land transfer with new buyer details
the land transfer should be updated successfully
the buyer details should reflect the new values

elements.name: Cannot update land transfer with COMPLETED status

steps.name: a land transfer exists with status "COMPLETED"
I try to update the land transfer
I should see error message "Cannot update completed land transfer"

elements.name: Complete land transfer when payment is PAID

steps.name: a land title exists with status "ACTIVE"
a land transfer exists with status "PENDING"
the transfer payment status changes to "PAID"
the land transfer status should change to "COMPLETED"
the land title status should remain "ACTIVE"
the land title owner details should be updated
the land title should have blockchain details
both seller and buyer hashes should be recorded on blockchain

name: Land Transfer Management

description:
As a user
  I want to create and manage payments
  So that I can complete land title registration transactions

steps.name: a land title exists with status "PENDING"
I am on the payments page
I submit without filling required fields
I should see validation error messages
the payment should not be created
a land title exists with status "PENDING"
I am on the payments page
the payment should be created successfully
a land title exists with status "PENDING"
a payment exists with transaction ID "TXN-2024-002"
I open the actions menu for the payment
I change the payment method to "Bank Transfer"
the payment details should be updated

elements.name: Confirm payment and activate land title

steps.name: a land title exists with status "PENDING"
a payment exists with transaction ID "TXN-2024-003"
the associated land title status is "PENDING"
I open the actions menu for the payment
the payment status should change to "PAID"
the associated land title status should change to "ACTIVE"
a blockchain hash should be recorded

elements.name: Cancel paid payment and revert land title

steps.name: a land title exists with status "PENDING"
a payment exists with transaction ID "TXN-2024-004"
the associated land title status is "ACTIVE"
I open the actions menu for the payment
the payment status should change to "CANCELLED"
the associated land title status should change to "PENDING"
a land title exists with status "PENDING"
a payment exists with transaction ID "TXN-2024-005"
I open the actions menu for the payment
the payment status should change to "CANCELLED"
the associated land title status should remain "PENDING"

name: Payment Processing

description:
As a new user
  I want to register and login to the system
  So that I can access land title registration features

steps.name: I am on the registration page
I register with the following details:
I should receive a user ID
an activation email should be sent
I should see error "Email already registered"
I should see error "Invalid email format"
I should see error "Password must be at least 8 characters"
I activate my account with the token
I should be able to login
I login with username "juan_delacruz" and password "SecurePass123!"
I should receive an authentication token
I should see my user profile
an active user exists with username "juan_delacruz"
I login with username "juan_delacruz" and password "WrongPassword"
I login with username "nonexistent" and password "AnyPassword"
I should see error "User not found"
a pending user exists with username "inactive_user"
I login with username "inactive_user" and password "ValidPass123!"
I should see error "Account not activated"

elements.name: Complete user journey - Register, Activate, and Login

steps.name: I register with username "maria_santos" and email "maria@example.com"
I should be able to access land title registration

name: User Registration and Authentication
